spec_data.Name: perl-Class-Base
spec_data.Description:
This module implements a simple base class from which other modules can be
derived, thereby inheriting a number of useful methods such as new(),
init(), params(), clone(), error() and debug().
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:28:46 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Useful base class for deriving other modules
